attributes.action: STOP PUBLIC SECTOR WORKERS GETTING FULLPAY WHEN OFF WORK SICK OR MORE LIKELY PRETENDING TO BE SICK
attributes.additional_details: Why should us private sector workers be taxed to pay for public sector workers getting full pay when off work ill or pretending to be ill?  We do not enjoy those benefits so why should we be taxed to pay for others. The taxes we pay to fund it should be staying in our own pockets to plan for our own rainy day, it's our money not theirs.
